data.title: How to Watch USA Network Live For Free 2024: Where to Stream Online
data.meta_description: Here's how to watch USA Network live for free and where to stream USA Network online without a cable subscription or TV.
data.text:
All products and services featured are independently chosen by editors. However, StyleCaster may receive a commission on orders placed through its retail links, and the retailer may receive certain auditable data for accounting purposes.

If you’re a WWE super fan or love a good Law & Order marathon, you’re likely wondering how to watch USA Network live for free. The channel features a wide range of live sports events, originals, reruns, and more, so keep scrolling to discover how to access it without a television or cable subscription.

Owned by Comcast’s NBCUniversal, USA Network launched in 1977 as Madison Square Garden Sports Network, which was one of the first national sports cable television channels. It then relaunched with its current name in 1980. Its long-standing partnership with WWF and WWE, original programming, and limited sports programming are what helped the network increase in popularity.

USA Network’s most notable originals include Monk, Psych, Mr. Robot, Suits, and more. However, it also airs reruns of current and former network series, including Law & Order: Special Victims Unit, Chicago P.D., Law & Order: Criminal Intent, and NCIS. You’ll additionally find WWE’s flagship cable program, Monday Night Raw (also known as WWE Raw or just Raw). The network’s relationship with WWE (formerly WWF) dates all the way back to 1977. USA Network aired the Westminster Kennel Club Dog Show from 1984 to 2016, as well.

Whether you’re in the mood for an action-packed Monday night with WWE or an NCIS rerun marathon, you won’t run out of live events and shows to tune into on USA Network. Keep reading to find out how to watch USA Network live for free.

How to watch USA Network live for free

USA Network is available to stream on services like DirecTV Stream, Fubo, Sling TV, and Hulu+ With Live TV. DirecTV Stream offers a five-day free trial and starts at $74.99 per month after the trial ends (with $10 off your first three months). Fubo offers a seven-day free trial, starts at $74.99 per month after the trial ends.

Sling TV and Hulu+ With Live TV don’t have free trials, however, they are cheaper per month than the other options. Sling Blue costs $22.50 for your first month and $45 per month after the first month ends, while Sling Orange + Blue costs $30 for your first month and $60 per month after the first month ends. Hulu+ With Live TV starts at $68.99 per month.

Best Overall Pick to Watch USA Network: DirecTV Stream

Best Free Trial Pick to Watch USA Network: Fubo

Best Budget Pick to Watch USA Network: Sling TV

Best Upgrade Pick to Watch USA Network: Hulu+ With Live TV

Best Overall Pick to Watch USA Network: DirecTV Stream

DirecTV Stream is our best overall pick to watch USA Network live for free for its free trial, price (including its current deal), and channel selection. DirecTV Stream offers a five-day free trial and has a current deal where new subscribers can receive $10 off their first three months. Direct TV offers four plans: Entertainment, which costs $74.99 per month with the first three months at $64.99 per month; Choice, which costs $99.99 per month with the first three months at $89.99 per month; Ultimate, which costs $109.99 per month with the first three months at $99.99 per month; and Premiere, which costs $154.99 per month with the first three months at $144.99 per month.

As for other differences between the plans, Entertainment includes more than 75 channels, the ability to stream on unlimited devices in your home, unlimited cloud DVR storage, and a special offer on premium channels. Choice, which is the most popular plan, includes more than 105 channels, regional sports networks, and everything included in Entertainment. Ultimate includes more than 140 channels and everything included in Entertainment and Choice. Premiere includes more than 150 channels including premium channels like HBO and Starz and everything included in Entertainment, Choice, and Premiere. Read on for step-by-step instructions on how to watch USA Network with DirecTV Stream’s free trial.

Visit streamtv.directv.com

Click “Shop Packages”

Click “Try It Free” for the plan of your choice

Enter your information and payment method

Search for USA Network and start watching

Best Free Trial Pick to Watch USA Network: Fubo

Fubo is our best free trial pick to watch USA Network live for free. Fubo offers a seven-day free trial (two days longer than DirecTV Stream) and offers three plans: Pro, which costs $74.99 per month; Elite, which costs $84.99 per month; and Ultimate, which costs $99.99 per month.

As for the difference between the plans, Pro includes 180 channels, 1,000 hours of Cloud DVR, and the ability to watch on up to 10 screens at once. Elite includes everything in Pro, as well as a total of 256 channels and 4K resolution. Ultimate includes everything in Pro and Elite, as well as a total of 299 channels, Showtime, and Red Zone NFL Network. Read on for step-by-step instructions on how to watch USA Network with Fubo’s free trial.

Visit Fubo.TV

Click “Start Free Trial”

Enter your information and payment method

Search for USA Network and start watching

Best Budget Pick to Watch USA Network: Sling TV

Sling TV is our best budget pick to watch USA Network based on its price and current deals. Sling TV offers two plans with USA Network: Sling Blue and Sling Orange + Blue. Sling Blue is currently half-off, costing just $22.50 for the first month and $45 per month after that. Sling Orange + Blue costs $30 for the first month and $60 per month after that.

As for the difference between the plans, Sling Blue includes 42 channels and the ability to stream on three devices at a time, while Sling Orange + Blue includes 46 channels and the ability to stream on three devices at the same time. Read on for step-by-step instructions on how to watch USA Network with Sling.

Visit Sling.com

Click “Try Us Today”

Create an account

Choose your plan

Enter your information and payment method

Search for USA Network and start watching

Best Upgrade Pick to Watch USA Network: Hulu+ Live TV

Hulu+ With Live TV is our best upgrade pick to watch USA Network based on its channel selection and its free subscriptions to Hulu, Disney Plus, and ESPN Plus. Hulu+ With Live TV offers four plans: a $68.99 per month plan with access to only live TV; a $69.99 per month plan with free subscriptions to Hulu with ads, Disney Plus with ads, and ESPN Plus with ads; a $74.99 per month plan with free subscriptions to Hulu with ads, Disney Plus with no ads, and ESPN Plus with ads; and a $82.99 per month plan with free subscriptions to Hulu with no ads, Disney Plus with no ads, and ESPN Plus with ads. Read on for step-by-step instructions on how to watch USA Network with Hulu+ Live TV.

Visit Hulu.com/liveTV

Click “Sign Up Now”

Enter your information and payment method

Search for USA Network and start watching
